hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="apigility" published_version="1.4.1"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
export Apigility_home=$(pwd)
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git apache2 curl openssl make wget tar gcc libssl-dev libxml2 libxml2-dev libxml-parser-perl pkg-config
#Install php cd $Apigility_home wget http://www.php.net/distributions/php-5.6.8.tar.gz tar xvzf php-5.6.8.tar.gz && cd php-5.6.8 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/php --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/php --with-mysql --with-openssl make sudo make install export PATH=/usr/local/php/bin:$PATH
#Build Apigility cd $Apigility_home sudo rm -rf zf-apigility-skeleton git clone https://github.com/zfcampus/zf-apigility-skeleton.git cd zf-apigility-skeleton git checkout 1.4.1 curl -s https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -- ./composer.phar -n update ./composer.phar -n install
./vendor/bin/zf-development-mode enable export IP=$(hostname -i) cd $Apigility_home/zf-apigility-skeleton php -S $IP:8080 -t public public/index.php &
ps -aef | grep php
